examples.translation: 身体受烈日暴晒会造成伤害。
examples.last: of the body to strong sunlight can be harmful.

examples.translation: 他们的癌症是否和接触放射线有关还不太清楚。
examples.first: Their cancers are not so clearly tied to radiation

n: vulnerability to the elements; to the action of heat or cold or wind or rain;
the act of subjecting someone to an influencing experience
面临（困难），显露，暴露,揭露,曝光
